title: About CriticalRoll
text: This is just a tool for handling critical and fumble effects in Tabletop RPGs like Pathfinder and D&D. Also, if there is need for instructions, the present text in this card should be enough evidence that it may be necessary to apply a way to format the text in the JSONs, because this may be the first card drawn after installation and it must be the only thing needed to understand the App.
